titleInfo.title: Letter to George Abraham from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter asks for Abraham - who is proceeding to Schiras [Shiraz] - to have eleven grants executed by Sadoo Khan renewed by Carim Cahn [Karim Khan] and to request for the English to be excempt from paying duties on all goods carried into or brought out of Persia, a privilege enjoyed under the former 'Kings of Persia'. The problems arising from having to pay customs at Bushire are described in detail.
